page_content:
* Circle Supervisor:*.
Dr. Robert Skiba, e-mail: robo@mat.umk.pl
*Current Executive Board of the Circle (for the academic year 2023/2024):*.
* Chairperson: Agnieszka Gołembiewska, e-mail: agagolembiewska@mat.umk.pl
* Deputy Chair: Adam Konysz, email: adamkon@mat.umk.pl
* Secretary: Łukasz Kotlewski, email: kotlewskilukasz@mat.umk.pl

* Former Board of Directors of the Circle (in the academic year 2022/2023):*.
* Chair: Aleksandra Lewandowska, email: 297125@stud.umk.pl or lewand@mat.umk.pl
* Deputy Chair: Igor Bialecki, e-mail: 297117@stud.umk.pl or igorbialecki@mat.umk.pl
* Secretary: Adam Konysz: e-mail: adamkon@mat.umk.pl

* Former Board of Directors of the Circle (in the academic year 2021/2022):*.
* Chairman: Adam Konysz: e-mail: adamkon@mat.umk.pl
* Deputy Chairman: Łukasz Kotlewski: e-mail: 305841@stud.umk.pl
* Secretary: Aleksandra Lewandowska, e-mail: 297125@stud.umk.pl

* Former Board of Directors of the Circle (in the academic year 2020/2021):*.
* Chairperson: Karolina Trokowska, e-mail: karolina5284@mat.umk.pl
* Deputy Chairperson: Aleksandra Lewandowska, e-mail: 297125@stud.umk.pl
* Secretary: Igor Białecki, e-mail: 297117@stud.umk.pl

* Functional positions:*.
* Webmaster: Dr. Robert Skiba, e-mail: robert.skiba@mat.umk.pl

*Honorary members of the Circle:*.
* Zbigniew Blaszczyk.
